title: New Client Issues
body: So I just played two games today, last one about 10 minutes ago, and my client (New) gave me an error that there's a problem with my internet and I can't connect to the game. I'm already logged in, but I can't do anything but restart or shutdown client, but I can still use my internet on anything else. and if I launch the Legacy Client I'm greeted with an error that says "Could not connect to the HTTP server, please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access." And closes down on me. I've restarted my router, my computer, everything is up to date, I can use the internet just fine, but the game will not let me do anything after I've played those games earlier today. Any ideas?

replies.body: There was an external network issue that affected our login service and a few other services briefly. This issue has since been resolved and everything is up now, so please let me know if you're still experiencing this issue.
This is ridiculous... I have had 5 games in a row where I got trolled because of auto fill. Now I can't even connect to the servers now. Thank you riot for a great day on league of legends.
